markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eroding Bullet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1192)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Acid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=3" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 169</row>

**Price** 22 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** round

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Eroding bullets cast a faint green glow, and smell like the sicklysweet organic gases that rise from corpses. Handling an eroding bullet without gloves deals 1 point of acid damage and leaves the putrid scent coated on your fingers. Upon Striking an enemy,  the glass casing inside the bullet bursts, releasing a splattering of bubbling green acid that coats the target. The target takes 2d6 [persistent acid damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) in addition to the damage normally dealt by the attack.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Eroding Bullet
